'''The Lord of the Rings: Duel for Middle-earth''' is a two-player card game, re-implementing the popular [https://www.rprod.com/en/games/7-wonders-duel 7 Wonders Duel] with the Lord of the Rings license. It features art by [[Vincent Dutrait]].

==From the publisher==
An Epic Duel for the Fate of [[Middle-earth]]! In The Lord of the Rings - Duel for Middle-earth, two players face off to determine the fate of Middle-earth. One player embodies the [[Fellowship of the Ring]], seeking to protect the free peoples and destroy the [[One Ring]], while the other plays as [[Sauron]], attempting to capture [[Frodo]] and [[Sam]] and overwhelm Middle-earth with his evil hordes.
